summary: Defines a compact implementation of the Iterative α-(de)Blending (IADB) diffusion algorithm, including a pipeline that runs a UNet denoiser and a scheduler that advances the diffusion steps to produce high‑quality images from latent tensors.
business_intent: Offers a ready‑to‑use reference for developers and researchers to integrate the IADB denoising technique into the Diffusers ecosystem, facilitating experimentation and prototyping of custom image generation workflows.
